short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada at the Springhill Institution in the Atlantic Region, National Public Safety, Request for proposal
description: The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) Health Services require the services of a psychologist for offenders housed at the Springhill Institution. Up to five (5) contracts may be awarded for this requirement. Objectives: Provide psychological risk assessment services to offenders, as requested by the Project Authority, at Springhill Institution as a psychologist.
